name: Explodin Bricx
description:
Title: Explodin Brix
Platform: PC Game
Genre: Platformer
Rating: E
Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers
Game Overview:
In this game, you must explode the temple and dodge enemies in order to win. Reach the final temple to collect your prize. Good luck finding the exploding temple! Careful! The panda blocks your every move so time it well and you can survive!
Instructions:
Used your WASD to move and space to jump
Game Design Team
Qadeem Qureshi – Game Designer
